General.Name: Tocvan Ventures Corp
General.Description: Tocvan Ventures Corp. engages in the exploration and evaluation of mineral resources properties in Mexico. The company primarily explores for gold and silver deposits. It holds interest in the the Pilar property, which comprises 2 concessions covering an area of totaling 105 hectares; and the El Picacho property that includes 12 mining concessions covering an area of 2,413.7 hectares located in the Sonora, Mexico. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1130 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4A4
